Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 48th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2019, off Braulio Escandon (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2019, off Max Rocha (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2019, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 9/11/2019...
Traded from Baltimore to Milwaukee on 5/6/2020 (Going to BAL: P Christopher Shavers, 3B Ariel Arguello, 3B Kaz Eitoku. Going to MIL: 3B Paul Laroche, 2B Wade Audet)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/21/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2020, hitting .542 with 0 HR, 3 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/9/2020 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York on 4/13/2021...
